variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: inCLLPRO
variable.description: Is used in CLL Progression Study

variable.name: inCLLPCRDUP
variable.description: Is used in CLL PCR Duplicate Study

variable.name: inROR1
variable.value: Yes and ROR1 signal is negative
Yes and ROR1 signal is positive

variable.name: inSF3B1
variable.value: Yes and SF3B1 is somatically mutated in tumor
Yes and SF3B1 is not somatically mutated in tumor

variable.name: DaysDiagnosisToSample
variable.description: Days from CLL diagnosis to sample

variable.name: DaysSampleToFirstTreatment
variable.description: Days from sample date to first treatment

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: PRIMARY_METASTATIC_TUMOR
variable.description: Primary tumor, metastasis, or transformed cell line

variable.name: TUMOR_TREATMENT
variable.description: Type of tumor treatment for sample

variable.name: GENOTYPING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted genotyping

variable.name: SEQUENCING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted sequencing
